title: Veggie No.1 Mensa FU
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine
description: This restaurant belongs to the Free University of Berlin which is 100% vegetarian. Best to go between 11am to 1pm when there's a full selection of food. You will need to get a "Mensa card" at the cashier because they don't take cash directly. Cleaning is done with eco-friendly products.
